title: Google\Cloud\Kms\V1\PublicKey
name: PublicKey
description:
The public key for a given [CryptoKeyVersion][google.cloud.kms.v1.CryptoKeyVersion]. Obtained via [GetPublicKey][google.cloud.kms.v1.KeyManagementService.GetPublicKey].

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.kms.v1.PublicKey

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.pem
params.description: The public key, encoded in PEM format. For more information, see the RFC 7468 sections for General Considerations and [Textual Encoding of Subject Public Key Info] (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7468#section-13).
